The high luminance lets even participants seated furthermost clearly see the slides and boosts picture quality with vibrant color for pictures and videos as well as crisp text and fine details.

product_list_short_description: USB supported â€“ completely PC free

product_page_short_description: USB supported â€“ completely PC free
full_description:
BENQ EX600 3600 Lumens XGA Wireless Smart Projector for Business

Smart Solutions to Elevate Your Agile Team

TeamViewer Meeting allows you to start video conferences anywhere. With TeamViewer Quick Support, ITS can remotely access projector to troubleshoot a problem. The WPS Office includes Writer, Presentation, and Spreadsheets, allowing you to create documents collaboratively with your team members in the meeting. Moreover, FireFox browser offers Internet connectivity to search for anything.

Take Control in Your Hand

BenQ Smart Control quickly turns your smartphone into a smart remote control, allowing you to lead a smooth meeting and finish your tasks on the spot.

USB Supported-Completely PC free

Supporting a wide range of file formats including JPEG, PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint files, and more, EX600â€™s USB Type-A port allows you to easily project images or documents directly onto the screen without the need for a PC.

Wireless Projection

Just bring your own smart phone, tablet, or laptop PC to instantly mirror what is shown on your device to the projection screen. This wireless solution eliminates cable clutter, facilitating immediate and convenient collaboration for improved teamwork and meeting productivity.

All Glass Lens Array

BenQ only uses high-quality glass lenses to minimize chromatic aberration, ensuring long-term image quality in brilliant clarity.

Exclusive Infographic Mode

Great showcasing the text and graphics of infographic in detail thanks to the high brightness and better color gradation.

DLP Projection for Zero Color Decay

BenQ DLP projectors maintain the most vivid, crisp images by eliminating color decay, preserving absolute picture quality for many years to come.

High Brightness and XGA Resolution

With 3600lm high brightness and XGA native resolution.EX600 offers subtle details, ultra-sharp readability.

Adjustment Feet for Convenient Setup

Two adjustment feet, including a retractable adjustment foot, significantly enhance flexibility for projector setup and mobility in various types of meeting rooms.

Vertical Keystone for Perfect Alignment

Vertical keystone function adjusts the image for a professinally squared image.Keystone correction makes it easy to project ideally aligned images from a variety of locations.

Wall Color Correction

Corrects the projected picture's color when the projection surface is not white to prevent the possible color difference between the source and projected pictures.

Flexible Projection Sizes

EX600 offers a flexible projection size from 60 to 180 inches, perfect for space-restrained huddle rooms or meeting rooms.

full_description:
BenQ EX800ST 3300 Lumens XGA Wireless Smart Android Projector

The BenQ EX800ST is a high-performance wireless smart projector designed to transform the way your teams collaborate. Packed with innovative features and intuitive functionality, the BenQ EX800ST simplifies content sharing, streamlines remote meetings, and enhances overall meeting management.

Effortless Connectivity

The BenQ EX800ST boasts effortless connectivity. The days of wrestling with cables are gone. With a few taps on your smartphone or laptop, you're wirelessly projecting presentations, charts, and brainstormed ideas onto the screen. Cloud storage becomes your playground; access and share documents directly from Google Drive, OneDrive, or Dropbox using the built-in AMS. No need to lug around a laptop – the EX800ST empowers a truly mobile workforce.

Remote Collaboration Made Simple

But the magic doesn't stop there. Imagine the convenience of initiating remote meetings with a single click. The BenQ EX800ST comes pre-loaded with TeamViewer Meeting, allowing you to connect with colleagues across the globe in crystal-clear clarity. Brainstorming sessions take on a new life. Capture ideas the moment they spark with the built-in WPS Office app. Open and edit Microsoft Office files directly on the projector, fostering agile collaboration that keeps your team on the cutting edge.

Enhanced Meeting Management

The BenQ EX800ST Projector isn't just about efficiency; it's about creating a seamless meeting experience. Need to remind everyone about the next agenda item? X-Sign Broadcast allows you to send messages directly to the projector, ensuring everyone stays on track. An important thought pops into your head. Jot it down instantly using the projector's note-taking capabilities. The BenQ Smart Control app puts the projector at your fingertips, transforming your smartphone into a remote control for a truly intuitive experience.

Superior Visual Performance

Visual clarity is paramount. The BenQ EX800ST delivers stunning visuals with its 3300 lumens of brightness, ensuring crisp and clear images even in brightly lit rooms. The short throw lens allows for impressive projection sizes in even the most compact meeting spaces. And for those times when a web search proves invaluable, the built-in web browser provides instant access to online resources, eliminating the need for a separate computer.

Built for Business

The BenQ EX800ST isn't just about features; it's about building a smarter way to work. With its versatile connectivity options and durable design, the BenQ EX800ST Smart Projector is built to last. It's a projector that anticipates your needs, fostering a collaborative environment that fuels innovation and propels your business forward.

Buy BenQ EX800ST Wireless Smart Android Projector from Star Tech

Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The BenQ EX800ST XGA Wireless Smart Android Projector comes with 02 Years Parts & 01 Year Lamp Warranty.

BenQ MX808STH 3600 Lumens XGA Short Throw Projector

BenQ MX808STH 3600 Lumens XGA Projector is best for interactive learning and classroom collaboration with outstanding picture quality, high brightness, and short throw capability. Smart installation flexibility combined with reduced maintenance and ownership costs. This projector, ensuring Stable Operation in Challenging Classroom Environment, Expanding Classroom Possibilities with Short Throw Ratio, Creating Lasting Lessons with Striking Picture Quality, Enduring Picture Perfection from DLP Technology, Simple and Convenient Wireless Dongle, Windows Gesture Support, Intuitive Setup.

Anti-Dust Accumulation Sensor, Resists Dust Buildup

In this prohector, Incorporating color wheel sensors comes with an ingenious anti-dust accumulation feature, that rejecting dust that can accumulate on traditional sensors to block the IR signal and cause flickering, abnormal colors, or even shutdown.

Unobstructed Instruction Without Space Constraints

This projector offering a big screen in short distance with a 0.61 short-throw ratio, It also eliminates distracting shadows and glare, collaborate freely in front of the board for students and teachers to engage.

Uncompromised High Brightness, Bigger Images

The latest MX808STH projector produces 3,600 high ANSI lumen brightness and resolution for perfect projection performance with crisp images and sharp text even in bright lecture room. Here, High brightness provides clear content under high ambient lighting and allowing lights to be kept on during classes for note taking and interactive collaboration. As well as, this projector offer a range of resolutions and projected image sizes to meet diverse classroom needs. Featuring crisp image quality up to 120 inches, ultra-short throw education projectors deliver increased classroom versatility at reduced costs.

Long Lasting Picture Quality

This projector comes with sealed design that protects the DLP chip from dust-induced image degradation and the industrial-grade durability of DLP projection technology, this is also capable of maintaining long-lasting picture quality by eliminating color decay, as well as it deliver premium picture quality equivalent to the result from brand new projectors after lamp replacement.

High DLP Pixel Fill Factor

This projector featured with class-leading high fill factor, minimizing black borders around each pixel to eliminate the dreaded â€œscreen door effectâ€� commonly observed in non-DLP projectors. And also produce superior definition and clarity in small-size text and fine details for beautifully rendered images instead of pixelated graphics.

Multi-Touch & Multi- Screen Drawing

This projectoe featured with enhanced multi-touch capability for pens or fingers, two PointWrite projectors can be used in conjunction to double the projection surface, creating vast new opportunities for learning in modern digital classrooms. In QWrite Whiteboard Mode, you can also run different applications or display, view, and annotate across two surfaces. Example - Class room environment.

Simplifying Installation

This projector allow convenient screen size fine-tuning through OSD menu to significantly save setup time, without need to physically adjust projector installation in case the sensitive short-throw image is not precisely aligned on the desired frame. And also, to setup the projector, Press the â€œQuick Installâ€� hotkey on the remote control.
